dsOverview.title: NESS NOAA Polar Orbiter Global Area Coverage (GAC), 1981-1982

summary.p: This dataset contains global-coverage satellite data from NOAA's polar orbiter for January 1981 to January 1982. For more information about the Global Area Coverage (GAC) data, see section 3.1 of the NOAA Polar Orbiter Data User's Guide.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Computational and Information Systems Laboratory, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCDC > National Climatic Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Spectral/Engineering > Visible Wavelengths > Visible Imagery
dsOverview.platform: NOAA POES > NOAA Polar Orbiting Environmental Satellites
